description: The RDF segment defines the content of the row data segments (RDT) in the Tabular Data Response Message (TBR). It is used in two ways:

fields.name: Number of Columns per Row
fields.description: This field specifies the number of data columns (and therefore the number of fields) contained within each row of returned data.

fields.name: Column Description
fields.description: Each repetition of this field consists of three components:

fields.name: Segment Field Name
fields.description: The HL7 segment field name, which identifies the field occupying the column. (Refer to Section 2.8.32, QIP - query input parameter list, for segment field name definition conventions.)

fields.name: Hl7 Data Type
fields.description: The two or three character HL7 data type, as defined in Section 2.8, Data types.

fields.name: Maximum Column Width
fields.description: The maximum width of the column, as dictated by the responding system. (This may vary from the HL7-defined maximum field length.)
